titleStmt.title: To the suffering Protestants, owning protestation, by Mr John Guthrie, minister of the gospel. 1669.
titleStmt.author: Guthrie, John, 1632-1669.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
An anti-Roman Catholic sermon relating the persecution being suffered by the Scottish Covenanters by a Covenanting minister.
Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
